Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â» Andy Garcia stars and directs his latest film, The Lost City. The film is Mr. Garcia's dramatic and historical romantic tribute to his native Cuba. Written by the Cuban master novelist, Guillermo Cabrera Infante, the film follows the tale of one family, three brothers and a beautiful woman whose fates are dramatically tied to that of a nation caught up in revolutionary turmoil.
